channel.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
channel.description:
Discuss, and feel free to include an image to express your emotions at that time for those who hate words.
Word version: Ecstatic. Can't believe it's finally here, even if only up to Lambda Core for now. I almost couldn't believe what I was seeing, and it took a good 5 minutes for it to register before peeing myself.
Picture version: Mine was probably about like this
![](upload://yfIPX3GwC6Vc2R3LICdgrhcG0Wb.gif)

item.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
The Master:

Pretty much how I responded as well. But now, now with the release of Steam’s Big Picture mode(https://store.steampowered.com/bigpicture/). I’ve recently found myself laughing hysterically…like Scrooge on Christmas morning. Needless to say it’s like the Black Mesa devs have dropped a giant delicious cake in front of me only to have Valve swing by moments later to drop a heaping helping of chocolate fudge on top. If you haven’t already, follow the link above to what the Big Picture mode is all about and you’ll know why my reaction to Black Mesa has doubled.

Read full topic

item.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
item.dc:creator: Cubbage_Odessa_Cubba
item.description:
Calm down, guys, jeez. The devs have been a bit pissy at times, but like TheeGoatPig said, they’re human. The man’s entitled to his own opinion, so there’s no need to get all angry at him about it.

That said, your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown! Page 8 - Take 2

Read full topic
item.source: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!

item.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Givekidsmeth:

Initially, was all “SWEET!”

Then became really, really unenthused about it. It took way too long, the developers have been famously rude (sorry, nothing excuses it) and will probably not live up to the hype.

Little crybaby wants the devs to pay him back for those precious minutes he wasted checking this site for updates, but that doesn’t mean they were rude… they owe you nothing

Read full topic
item.source: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!

item.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
item.dc:creator: Givekidsmeth
item.description:
xalener:

The devs haven’t been rude at all. We’re the ones who’ve been rude, we’re not the fucking devs you shithead.

Don’t make excuses for them. I know lots of devs that have had stressful, shitty jobs and don’t take it out on their fans.

That said, I did say I was going to be supporting them regardless. But that doesn’t mean that, just because I think their work is good and I applaud them for finishing something so ambitious (whatever the quality is,) that their shit doesn’t stink. It’s not a hard concept to grasp, even though I know this community has just been one big circle jerk for the past five years.

And telling me that my opinion is wrong is kind of retarded. It’s an opinion. Like assholes, everyone has one.

Read full topic
item.source: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!

item.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Givekidsmeth:

Initially, was all “SWEET!”

Then became really, really unenthused about it. It took way too long, the developers have been famously rude (sorry, nothing excuses it) and will probably not live up to the hype.

That said, I’m still going to support it and the people who put so much work into it, and starting with low expectations means that I’m only going to be impressed, rather than let down by something that is still basically just a mod.

:what:

Read full topic
item.source: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!

item.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
The developers have been rude on occasion when the community has frustrated them. They are human, and have human feelings with human tempers.

You aren’t helping any by adding to the bad vibes. now is a time for celebration. Now is a time for good vibes. Can the hatred and share the love.

Read full topic

item.title: Your reaction to the Black Mesa countdown!
item.dc:creator: Juan_Regular
item.description:
First thing I did was fall off my couch. Then I calculated when exactly I´ll be downloading it. 4:45pm on friday.
Then I set my CD alarm to wake me with the Black Mesa Soundtrack at that time.

4 and a half days left to go. Getting closer.

Read full topic
